name: The Watcher (Turtle Cream)
description:
The Watcher is a game like an interactive animation for experiment 'gameplay without gameplay'. Aliens are trying to make an UFO to escape from a jungle. They're really shy guys. So player should keep watching them only. (On the other hand, you should hit the keys super fast after they finished to make an UFO.)

The game has been shown at the exhibition called 'Hybrid Highlights', in Seoul National University Museum of Art.
